input_query:
You plan to visit 6 European cities for 17 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 5 days in Venice. You would like to meet your friends at Venice between day 3 and day 7 to tour together. You would like to visit Amsterdam for 3 days. During day 1 and day 3, you have to attend a conference in Amsterdam. You would like to visit Athens for 5 days. You have to attend a workshop in Athens between day 7 and day 11. You plan to stay in Hamburg for 5 days. You plan to stay in Madrid for 2 days. You want to spend 2 days in Lyon.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Athens and Hamburg, Hamburg and Madrid, Amsterdam and Athens, Amsterdam and Lyon, Venice and Athens, Amsterdam and Venice, Madrid and Lyon, Amsterdam and Hamburg, Venice and Madrid, Venice and Hamburg, Amsterdam and Madrid, Athens and Madrid, Venice and Lyon.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 17 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.

city_day_ranges.note: Meet friends in Venice between day 4 and day 7
Attend workshop between day 9 and day 11
